lines.text: Rambo? Rambo's a pussy.

You wanna cut my throat, go ahead. You wanna cut my fuckin' head off and use it for a fuckin' basketball? You can *bowl* with the motherfucker for all I care! Just don't let HIM do it! I don't wanna get killed by this limey, immigrant JERKOFF! I wanna get killed by an AMERICAN jerkoff!

[English accent]
You fucking wanker!
Lucky for me this place is soundproof. That way nobody gets to hear me beating the truth out of you.
[Tango has just stuck a grenade down a bad guy's pants]
My contribution to birth control.
If you really wanted to stare death in the eye, you shoulda gotten married.

[laughs]
Is that a proposal?
When this is over, we have to pay Jabba the Hutt here a visit.
I'll bring the chainsaw.
I'll bring the beer.
You're getting a little radical here, don't you think?
What's radical?
Blowing a man's head off with a fucking hand grenade is a touch much, don't you think?
You got your way, I got mine. You know, I'm kind of glad you didn't want to talk, Requin...
You know what? I'll just shoot him in the goddamn leg, he'll talk!
I don't want the leg, I want the whole package!
Maybe he doesn't know anything, okay?
I don't really care!
I don't know about you, but I have an aversion to getting F.U.B.A.R...
What's F.U.B.A.R.?
Fucked-Up Beyond All Recognition.
What's widdya friend?
He's a little upset. He misses his wardrobe.
[then as they leave the room]
I DO miss my wardrobe.
You know, it's a free country, Tango.
Yeah.
And people are free to do whatever they want.
So?
Well, your sister is very, very free.
I'm going to kill you.
[Tango grabs a hefty submachine gun and hands Cash a pistol]
Here.
Aw, c'mon, how come yours is bigger than mine?
Genetics, peewee.
[after Requin breaks down and confesses]
bad cop...
Worse cop!
You don't know anything about electricity, do you?
No.
As long as you're only touching one wire and you're not touching the ground, you don't get electrocuted.
[Thinks about it for a moment]
Um, right?
I don't know.
I don't either.
[Tango just bursts through screen door and lands on his captain]
Captain?
Is this the way you screen all your guests?
Do you think he's telling the truth?
I don't know. But it's not raining and he's standing in a puddle.
Disgusting.
What are you doing? What are you doing?
Relax. Soap. And don't flatter yourself... Peewee.
Your Honor, the defendants wish to change their plea.
[Crowd is stunned. Judge McCormick bangs his gavel]
Order! Very well, Counselor. What is the plea?
Your Honor, may I approach the bench, please?
Proceed, Mr. Tango.

[Gets up, looks at Owen]
It's okay.
[Tango approaches the bench]

Your Honor, I have been a policeman for 12 years, and I think it's the best organization in the country. At times, I've been accused of being too aggressive at taking criminals off the streets. Well, if that's a sin, then I guess I'm guilty. All the cops I've worked with are good cops. They are... doing a tough job. And I only hope that the outcome of this trial is such, that the whole department is not judged by what has transpired here. Thank you.
[Tango returns to his seat]
Do you have anything to add, Mr. Cash?

[Nods]
Yeah.

[Grabs Cash's arm]
No!
Yeah.
No-no.
Yeah.
No.
[Cash gets up]
Mr. Tango has, uh, spoken very eloquently. I wish I could be as forgiving. But I can't, because... this whole thing... fucking sucks! I mean, this is the biggest pile of shit I've ever...
[Crowd applauses]
Order! Order!
Rats in a maze, men in a cage.
When this is over, remind me to rip Jumbo there's tongue out.
With a tow truck.
This has got to be a mistake. What do you think?
I think my underwear is riding into my throat.
I think that with your IQ, you're unarmed and still VERY dangerous.
[watching TV footage of Tango in action]
Oh, God. Ray Tango. How he loves to dance. He waltzes in and takes all my drugs, then tangos back out again.
[Looking at a picture of Ray Tango in the paper]
Well, if it isn't Armani with a badge.
Ah, the infamous Cash and Tango. Dishonored. Imprisoned. Such a shameful fall from glory.
And who are you?
Just think of me as somebody who doesn't like you very much.
Why just use your Plan A?
Because it's a hell of a lot better than your Plan B, which you don't even have.
Pleasure doing time with ya.
Yeah, I'll never forget that time in the shower.
[walking to the showers in prison naked]
Nice to see your underwear problem is solved.
I noticed. And Cash? You can stop holding your stomach.
Detective Cash assaulted me. He put a chair on my chest and sat on it.

[Tango looks at Cash, surprised]
I couldn't find a piano.
Oh, I've had enough of this. Too much television... can hurt your eyes.
Quicker... and easier. Yes, quick and easy is how you make a cake. Or clean a toilet bowl, or shop... by mail. But quicker and easier is not how you run a multi-million dollar business such as ours.
When the one Great Scorer comes to write against your name, he'll mark... not that you won or lost... but how you played the game. What bullshit!
[Requin is holding Cash at gunpoint, when Tango appears behind him]

[English accent]
Shame, shame! Don't you know ponytails are out this season? How you doin', Cash?

[disarms Requin]
Oh, things are just getting better by the second.
There's a party up on the roof.
Can I invite Mr. Potato Head here?
Sure! Wouldn't be a party without Potato Head.

Your Honor, I have been a policeman for 12 years and I think it's the best organization in the country. At times I've been accused of being too aggressive at taking criminals off the street. Well, if that's a sin, I guess I'm guilty. All the cops I've worked with are good cops.
[to fellow officers]
You are. Doing a tough job. And I only hope that the outcome of this trial is such that the whole department is not judged by what has transpired here. Thank you.
Do you have anything to add Mr. Cash?

[snickers]
Yeah.
No.
Oh, yeah.
No no.
Yeah.
No.

[stands up to address the judge]
Mr. Tango has spoken very eloquently and I wish I could be as forgiving. But I can't because this whole thing... FUCKING SUCKS.
I believe in Perestroijka.
Welcome to America.
[Tango's just stopped a truck and its occupants are now rolling sore on the road]
Glad you could drop in. Do you like jewelery?
[presenting cuffs]
Oh, fuck you.
I prefer blondes.
[Conan spits on Tango's shoes]

[tossing cuffs onto the ground]
Do the honors.

[unable to see the chaos outside the car]
Cash what was that noise?
Don't worry Owen, just a couple speed bumps.
[dangling Requin off a roof by his legs]
Come on, you meat puppet! Who pulls your strings?
Piss off! Bollocks to Plan A! I like this! The view's great up here! Heh, heh!
What'd he say?
Plan "A"'s a loser.
Hold on. Give me a name, Death-Breath, or you're going back to fucking England in a fucking baggie!
Up yours, arsehole! You ain't worth a toss! Go on, drop me! Do it!
Plan "A" is definitely a loser.
You want my vote for the Psycho Hall of Fame, asshole? You got it!
I've got good news and bad news.
What's the bad news?
We're almost out of gas.
What's the good news?
We're ALMOST out of gas.
I don't think there's a golf course.
This is the tape that's gonna clear our names, courtesy of our friend Jumbo the Forgerer. What do you got?
I got a quarter of four.
[Conan arrives to the laundry full of vengeful prisoners]
Oh shit, it's Conan.
What?
It's Conan.
We're gonna get F.U.B.A.R now.
What the hell is F.U.B.A.R?
You'll see.
Real bad ass cops. You don't look so tough now, do you? DO YOU, YOU FUCK?

[to Cash]
He must mean you.
Out on the streets, this pig and his cop friends, broke my ribs, my leg and my jaw.
[tsks at Tango]
You broke that jaw?
He deserved it.
No, no, wait! I got it! It's Lopez!
There you go thinking again. That will be the cause of your downfall. Try... try to control your fear. These men are convicted killers and fugitives. They won't last long on the outside.
Mr. Perret, we cannot rely on the police. I insist...
Don't insist! Insistent people make me angry. Everything is under control.
[Slams remote]

[to Requin]
Cover your tracks.
I'm not afraid of you. See that? I killed him.
Congratulations.
He was my best friend.
[Ray Tango looks up bewildered]
Crazy people aren't afraid of anybody.
We're gonna get FUBAR now.
What the hell is FUBAR?
You'll see.
